list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of four equal or corresponding parts into which something is or can be divided.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she cut each apple into quarters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy cắt từng quả táo thành quý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one fourth of a pound (avoirdupois, equal to 4 ounces).
the haunches or hindquarters of a horse.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ có khu cơ bắp mạnh mẽ, mạnh mẽ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of a town or city having a specific character or use.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is a beautiful port city with a fascinating medieval quarter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là một thành phố cảng xinh đẹp với một khu phố thời trung cổ hấp dẫn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the direction of one of the points of the compass, especially as a direction from which the wind blows.
rooms or lodgings, especially those allocated to people in military or domestic service.
pity or mercy shown toward an enemy or opponent who is in one's power.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the riot squad gave no quarter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Squad bạo loạn đã cho không có quý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of four or more roughly equal divisions of a shield separated by vertical and horizontal lines.
divide into four equal or corresponding parts.
be stationed or lodged in a specified place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều người được xếp hàng trong lều

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: range over or traverse (an area) in every direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we watched a pair of kingfishers quartering the river looking for minnows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã xem một cặp cá bói cá khu vực sông đang tìm kiếm minnows

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: display (different coats of arms) in quarters of a shield, especially to show arms inherited from heiresses who have married into the bearer's family.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Edward III quartered the French royal arms with his own
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Edward III quý tay hoàng gia Pháp với chính mình
